power.title: Climber's Claws
power.fluff: Thick claws spring from your hands, allowing you to scale surfaces quickly

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power as part of a short rest. If you do, it lasts for one hour, but immediately ends if you enter combat.

power.title: Combat Surge
power.fluff: As your attack goes awry, you react from the heat of your rage, without pause or thought, reversing your weapon and striking again

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be raging.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You miss with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reroll the triggering attack roll.

section.name: Special:
section.text: If the rerolled attack is still a miss, you regain the use of this power when you take a short rest.

power.title: Cull Weakness
power.fluff: Only the strong survive, and you let your enemies know that you are a survivor as you strike down the weakest among them with ease

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Cull Weakness stance.
Until the stance ends, bloodied enemies grant combat advantage to you, and you gain a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against them.

power.title: Indomitable Shift
power.fluff: You pound across the battlefield, leaving no openings as you move, and then draw strength from teh numbers arrayed against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Charisma modifier.
You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier, plus 2 additional temporary hit points for each enemy within 2 squares you can see.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + Constitution modifier, and an additional 3.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + Constitution modifier, and an additional 4.

power.title: Instinctive Charge
power.fluff: Instinctively aware of danger, you are poised to fight as soon as the battle begins

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You roll initiative at the beginning of an encounter

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain the following benefits:
► +5 power bonus to the triggering initiative check.
► +2 power bonus to speed until the end of your first turn.
► +2 power bonus to the first attack roll you make before the end of the encounter.

power.title: Laugh It Off
power.fluff: You laugh at your foe's attack, making even its mightiest effort seem pointless against your boundless endurance

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits you with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reduce the triggering attack's damage by an amount equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier.
You gain a +2 bonus to the first damage roll you make against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack's damage was reduced to 0, you instead gain a +4 bonus.
If the triggering attack was a critical hit or bloodied you, you also gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll you make against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Loss of Will
power.fluff: As you turn aside your foe's attack, you stare into its eyes, letting it know in no uncertain terms that the battle is in your favor

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy misses you with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of its next turn, the target takes a penalty to all attack rolls against you equal to your Charisma modifier.
If the target is bloodied and you are not, it also takes a penalty to all attack rolls against your allies. The penalty equals one-half the penalty it has against you.

power.title: Primal Charge
power.fluff: You thunder across the battlefield in a blur of steel and speed

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +1 power bonus to speed. This increases to +3 when charging.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: +2 power bonus, +4 when charging.
